reference.shortdesc: The cmdname element identifies the name of a software command.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The cmdname element is specialized from keyword. It is defined in the software domain module.

section.title: Attributes
section.p: The following attributes are available on this element: and keyref.

example.title: Example
example.p: In the following code sample, the cmdname element identifies the name of the rm command.
example.codeblock: Use the rm command to permanently delete an object.
